game_description: You play in new TV-show. Time yourself well, concentrate and perform the round before the guillotine cut off your hand. You must demonstrate skill as they endure seemingly simple tasks, in the hope of winning a champion cup. Handless show is vr game with 15 rounds with a gradually increasing degree of complexity. Each round has a mini-game. You need to show your mind, reaction, speed to complete the mini-game

review_2: The Handless Show is an amazing VR game show experience. It brings me back to watching game shows as a child, and playing the stressful board game Operation. Your skills and reflexes will be put to the test in this game show. With 20 fun mini games to step on up to and play. People are not here to see you win a new car, or a stack of money. No they are here to watch your hands get cut off. That's right, in this game show, we play in hopes of keeping our hands. The game is very easy to learn, nerve wrecking to master. The mini games are each unique and fun to play, and will bring a smile to your face and tense you up at the same time. One wrong move and CHOP, your hands come off. The graphics and sounds are great, making you feel like you are a contestant on a game show. The crowd cheering you on as you rise onto the show just feels amazing. The controls are very easy to use and figure out. The game had a few glitches where my hands got stuck in the game, but it did not happen often. Fun factory this game has. I love playing this game over and over. Losing is actually fun in this game. If you love game shows, and want to feel the call to come on down and be the next contestant, the Handless Show is a VR experience for you.
